formatDescription: The Nullsoft Streaming Video (NSV) format is a multimedia container format designed to enable streaming of video and audio.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
formatProvenance: 04/2024 (v.118)- Signature named 'Nullsoft Video with optional header' updated to extend byte range between two strings. Submitted by Preservica.

internalSignatures.name: Nullsoft Video with optional header
internalSignatures.note: BOF: 'NSVf'{24-16384}'NSVs' (must have minimum 24 byte header but can include variable amount of metadata, Table of Contents)
